alert.note: Alert for Barron; Chippewa; Dunn; Rusk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 10:58PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Rusk, northeastern Dunn, northern Chippewa and eastern Barron Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1058 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Auburn, or 18 miles south of Rice Lake, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Weyerhaeuser around 1115 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bruce and Ladysmith. This includes U.S. Highway 53 between mile markers 106 and 148. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
